body_html:
I am wondering what is the current status of this issue?
It is really hard to write code when Pytorch does not support autograd on sparse matrix. It would be very nice if we can use sparse matrix just like dense matrix.

body:
I am wondering what is the current status of this issue? 
It is really hard to write code when Pytorch does not support autograd on sparse matrix. It would be very nice if we can use sparse matrix just like dense matrix.
